title: List of all Androidimage chooser   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidimage chooser   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: image-chooser-library
repoList.description: An Easy Image/Video Chooser Library for your Android Apps

repoList.name: MultiImageChooser
repoList.description: Multiple image selector library for Android

repoList.name: ImagePicker
repoList.description: Android library to choose image from gallery or camera with option to compress result image

repoList.name: android-media-picker
repoList.description: A simple and easy to use Media Picker android library. Choose any image, video or audio from your device

repoList.name: WAProfileImage
repoList.description: WAProfileImage - A library for Android for choosing and editing profile image like WhatsApp

repoList.name: ImageChooserSample
repoList.description: This is sample application for using facebook fresco and imagechooselibrary to upload the picture from library or camero for android mobile app

repoList.name: ImagePicker
repoList.description: Android ImagePicker library use to choose images from Gallery and also provide an option to capture image from camera.

repoList.name: UtilLib
repoList.description: Library contains Location, Run time Permission, Image chooser in Android Project

repoList.name: image-file-chooser
repoList.description: Android Library

repoList.name: image-picker-crop-wrapper
repoList.description: wrapper for image-chooser-library and android-crop
